name: PADCEV 20 MG
treatmentDescriptions: PADCEV, in combination with pembrolizumab, is indicated for the first-line treatment of adult patients with unresectable or metastatic urothelial cancer (mUC). PADCEV, as a single agent , is indicated for the treatment of adult patients with locally advanced or mUC who: •	have previously received a programmed death receptor-1 (PD-1) or programmed death-ligand 1 (PD-L1) inhibitor, and a platinum-containing chemotherapy in the neoadjuvant/adjuvant, locally advanced or metastatic settingor:•	are ineligible for cisplatin-containing chemotherapy and have previously received a PD-1/PD-L1 inhibitor.
form: powder for concentrate for solution for infusion
warnings: תרופה מוגבלת לרישום ע'י רופא מומחה או הגבלה אחרת
